name: Tubit: Live Streams
description: Watch live video streaming on Tubit worldwide. Chat, entertain, and have a blast with the Tubit community! Tubit is one of the fastest moving live streaming apps available and connects you with a talented global community of broadcasters. Every second brings a surprise on Tubit!   Watch and meet new people in live video streams, follow streamers and talents you like, and interact. Register an account to comment on public video streams for free. You can even watch and hear live video streams without registering!   Install Tubit to enjoy instant live chat streams full of life, skills, conversation and more. See things certain to make you happy!  WATCH LIVE  discover live video streams and watch broadcasters who catch your eye. Follow your favorites, comment in their public chat window, and send virtual gifts using coins!   Get the very best live video streaming features on Tubit:   Download the Tubit app FREE.  Watch video chat streams FREE  no need to register!  View over 1 million members  Register a profile to add FREE public messages in video chat windows.  Follow the streamers and talents you like the most.  Buy coins to send virtual gifts: a vibrant rose, happy sunshine and more.  Tubit coins: members can buy coin packages to send virtual gifts to a broadcaster.  Please note: Tubit is only suitable for people 18+ years.  How Tubit works:  Install Tubit & watch live video streams free (no registration needed).  Create a Tubit profile to access all service features.  Buy coins to send virtual gifts.  Experience Tubit and discover the very best in social entertainment. Meet broadcasters online right now and chat live!
